Package dr.evomodel.epidemiology.casetocase

Class Summary
AbstractCase Abstract class for cases; best implemented as an inner class in implementations of AbstractOutbreak User: Matthew Hall Date: 15/04/13
AbstractOutbreak Abstract class for outbreaks User: Matthew Hall Date: 14/04/13
CaseToCaseTransmissionLikelihood A likelihood function for transmission between identified epidemiological cases Timescale must be in days.
Morelli12Outbreak Adaptation of the farm incubation and infectious period models from Morelli et al, PLoS Computational Biology, 2012 (10.1371/journal.pcbi.1002768.g001) Non-extended paintings for now User: Matthew Hall Date: 07/09/2012
NodePaintingSwitchOperator This operator finds a branch that corresponds to a transmission event, and moves that event up one branch or down one branch
SimpleOutbreak Simple version with no latent period; built for speed and extended paintings User: Matthew Hall Date: 07/09/2012
TransmissionExchangeOperatorA Implements branch exchange operations that leave the transmission network unchanged.
TransmissionExchangeOperatorB Implements branch exchange operations that also exchange entire subtrees of the transmission tree.
TransmissionSubtreeSlideA Implements the subtree slide move where the slide does not affect the transmission tree.
TransmissionSubtreeSlideB Implements the subtree slide move where the slide does not affect the transmission tree.
TransmissionTreeOperator An operator that wraps a (phylogenetic) tree operator and adjusts the transmission tree accordingly.
TransmissionWilsonBaldingA Implements the Wilson-Balding branch swapping move if it does not change the transmission tree.
TransmissionWilsonBaldingB Implements the Wilson-Balding branch swapping move if it moves an entire subtree of the transmission tree.
 

Exception Summary
